Description.Name: Sniper Cannon
Description.Details: The Sniper Rifle Artillery Piece is the smaller cousin to the Long Tom Artillery Piece designed by Armstrong Industries. As the second most-powerful tube artillery in the Inner Sphere, the Sniper can cripple or destroy most light and medium BattleMechs with a single hit. The weapon has an effective range of 9 kilometers. Can be mounted on vanilla mechs only for technical reasons.

Description.Name: ARTILLERY FIRE
Description.Details: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Fires an artillery attack at target location for area effect damage. Has limited uses per mission.
